text: @narendramodi @dpradhanbjp JEE Main, NEET 2020: Lakhs of students are waiting for a decision on the postponement of the JEE Main and NEET 2020. In the wake of the coronavirus outbreak, the CBSE and ICSE Boards have already announced the cancellation of Class 10 and Class 12 board exams...@narendramodi
